the gerp note ger stands for goal

documentation process for Behavioral
Health is a burden uh for the providers
often times they spend upwards of 40% of

that they deliver that's almost 2 days a

that we're building with AWS Health
scribe was to lessen that kind of

and allow the computer to do that

in real time uh with that individual
